71746.text: Expand kubectl wait to work with more types of selectors.
71746.markdown: Expand kubectl wait to work with more types of selectors. ([#71746](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/71746), [@rctl](https://github.com/rctl)) Courtesy of SIG CLI, and SIG Testing
71746.author: rctl

72832.text: The CustomPodDNS feature gate has graduated to GA, and can no longer be disabled. The feature gate will be removed in v1.16
72832.markdown: The CustomPodDNS feature gate has graduated to GA, and can no longer be disabled. The feature gate will be removed in v1.16 ([#72832](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/72832), [@MrHohn](https://github.com/MrHohn)) Courtesy of SIG Apps, SIG Network, and SIG Node
72832.author: MrHohn

59176.text: exit kube-proxy when configuration file changes
59176.markdown: exit kube-proxy when configuration file changes ([#59176](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/59176), [@dixudx](https://github.com/dixudx))
59176.author: dixudx

73250.text: The `rules` field in RBAC Role and ClusterRole objects is now correctly reported as optional in the openapi schema.
73250.markdown: The `rules` field in RBAC Role and ClusterRole objects is now correctly reported as optional in the openapi schema. ([#73250](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/73250), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt))
73250.author: liggitt

70309.text: AWS ELB health checks will now use HTTPS/SSL protocol for HTTPS/SSL backends.
70309.markdown: AWS ELB health checks will now use HTTPS/SSL protocol for HTTPS/SSL backends. ([#70309](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/70309), [@2rs2ts](https://github.com/2rs2ts))
